answer:
• Vx -Best Angle of Climb
  • Vy -Best Rate of Climb
  • Va -Design maneuvering speed. The speed up to which full deflection of any single flight control is acceptable
  • Vno -Maximum structural speed for normal operations
  • Vfe -Maximum flaps extended speed
  • Vne -Never exceed speed
  • VS0 -Stall speed in a landing configuration
  • VS1 -Stall speed at a designated configuration (generally, flaps and gear up)
question: Define the following aircraft "V-speeds"
